channel.title: Question... please help!
channel.description: How do i make a command to spawn objects while i'm in my server? (Ex. ::object [id]) I'm using deltascape source. I tried to take the code from another server (David Scape source) but seemingly, the 508 codes are different than 317. Can someone give me a command to use? Thx. :)

item.title: Question... please help!
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

OK, Heres another idea:
How would I tramslate this 508 command…

[code]if(cmd[0].startsWith(“object”)){

p.frames.createGlobalObject(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0, p.absX, p.absY, 0, 10);

} [/code]
Into something my 317 would accept?

Read full topic

item.title: Question... please help!
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

oh why dident you say so… :3

          } else if (command.startsWith("object")
                    && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ursusername")) {
				
                try {
                    int object = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
                    int orient = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13, 14));
                    int type = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(15));

                    AddGlobalObj(absX, absY, object, orient, type);
                    // createNewTileObject(absX, absY, object, orient, type);
                } catch (Exception e) {
                    sendMessage("Bad object ID"); 
                }

item.title: Question... please help!
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“item”)
&& (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“yourusername”)
|| (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“coownersusername”)))) {
try {
int newitem = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

                if (/* newitem <= 20000 && */newitem >= 0) { 
                    ItemHandler.addItem(newitem, absX, absY, playerItemsN[1],
                            playerId, false);
                    ItemHandler.itemExists(newitem, absX, absY);
                } else {
                    sendMessage("No such item");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Bad item ID");
            }[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 13, 2009, 09:55:19 pm[/size][hr]if u already gots that in the server type ::item 01000

and it should spawn

item.title: Question... please help!
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Code:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("You suck at spawning. Do it again ! ");
        }
    }[/code]

Try that


That’s NOT what I meant! I don’t need ::pickup items. I need a command that spawns global objects while I’m in my server. Read this again people! Read more CAREFULLY!
How do i make a command to spawn objects while i'm in my server? (Ex. ::object [id]) I'm using deltascape source. I tried to take the code from another server (David Scape source) but seemingly, the 508 codes are different than 317. Can someone give me a command to use? Thx. Smiley
Now, If anyone has any help for me... I would really appreciate it! ;)

Read full topic
